title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - What should Canelo do next
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - What should Canelo do next
description:
Chris is joined by the former boxer and current Showtime analyst, Abner Mares, as they discuss Canelo's future, how he should approach his next fight, and how only a select few fighters need to earn the right to fight Canelo. Later, Joshua Buatsi stops by to talk about boxing in the Olympics, and where he views himself in the boxing landscape. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
